participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic about her interests, particularly in entertainment.
participant_1.background: I like to use my tablet to listen to music while I'm getting ready. I am not very good at playing basketball. I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels. I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I love The Walking Dead.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about music, with a strong work ethic.
participant_2.background: My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together. I love to go to concerts with my friends because we can all sing and dance along. I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work. My future clients will love how I've combined my love of cleanliness and my talent for planning to create the best wedding days of their lives. I like to make things with my hands.

content.text: I love The Walking Dead too! How far are you into the series?
I love it! I'm only on season 3, I just got into it recently.
Oh that's so funny, I'm on season 8! It's my favorite show.
I can't wait to catch up! My favorite part is when Glenn dies.
That was crazy! I didn't see that coming.
Me neither! I was so upset.
No, I haven't. Are they good?
They're great! They're a lot different than the show, but they're really good.
I'll have to check them out then!
You should! I think you'd like them.
